column1: Little Goat Diner////We ordered several dishes
column2: all of which were amazing.  The goat cheese chili fries were a unique blend on this common bar staple.  My girlfriend ordered a burger and it was delicious.  Plenty of flavor and the perfect size for lunch.  My dish of choice was the Sloppy Goat
column3: their modern version of the sloppy joe made with goat on a squash roll.  To describe this dish in one word
column4: wow.  It was huge and just as messy as the school cafeteria version of times past
column5: only twice as good and not served by someone wearing a hair net!
